nodes.text: Attack Pattern Tartarus was a space warfare tactic used by the Imperial Navy during the Galactic Civil War. Used under the auspices of Formation Besh, it entails dropping out of hyperspace right on top of an enemy upon verifying their position via a nearby starfighter squadron both to surprise them and to block their hyperspace vector.
Captain Lennox used this tactic to attack Rebel Star Cruisers with his group of Star Destroyers during the Battle of Turkana.
